item.description:
Steve has 9 tickets... first come first served. You should make arrangements with him on how to get the tickets and prepay for them. If you RSVP make sure you contact him at the same time to make arrangements. If you RSVP - and take the spot you will owe him the $15 whether you go or not.

This is a high energy show. The music is great and the crowd will be dancing all night. If any of you have not been, it's a nice little restaurant in downtown Wareham. The food is good, generous drinks, friendly staff and great decor. Go early for dinner if you can.
item.how_to_find_us: Make arrangeents with Steve ahead of time. - you will need to in order to get your ticket. But he is going to try to get the table in the window to the left of the door.
item.why: I saw this band a few weeks ago... Theyâ€™re unbelievable. A great U2 Sound and they get the place rockin'

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: The Joshua Tree at Piper Beau's in Wareham (U2 Tribute band)
